footer.container: position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 14px; padding: 16px; color: #98989d; font-size: 13px; border-top: 1px solid #2c2c2e; background: #1c1c1e;
footer.text: color: inherit; transition: color 0.2s ease; white-space: nowrap;

emphasis.em: font-style: normal; color: #98989d; background: rgba(152,152,157,0.1); padding: 0 4px;

list.taskList: list-style: none; margin-left: -22px; font-size: 15px; color: #d1d1d6; line-height: 1.75;

code.block: background: #2c2c2e; padding: 1em 1.2em; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 14px; font-family: SF Mono, Menlo, monospace; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; color: #ffffff; margin: 1.3em 0;
code.inline: background: #2c2c2e; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 6px; color: #ffffff; font-size: 14px; font-family: SF Mono, Menlo, monospace;

styles.quote: border-left: 3px solid #0A84FF; padding: 0 0 0 18px; margin: 1.2em 0; color: #f2f2f7; font-style: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.75;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1.3em auto; border-radius: 12px;
styles.link: color: #0A84FF; text-decoration: underline; text-underline-offset: 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1.3em 0; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; border: 1px solid #2c2c2e;
